Articles.Content:
If this game already exists, somebody let me know and i'll have this taken down.

So the point of the game is to find something about the last user, or users , if they all have this thing in common, that have posted here and basically say it is cheating. Example.

..................................................................................................................................................

Poster #1, in response to OP: Posting a forum game is considered cheating in some parts. CHEATER!

..................................................................................................................................................

Poster #2, in response to poster #1: Don't you know that being the first to post is cheating? YOU CHEATER!

..................................................................................................................................................

Poster #3, in response to poster #1-2: Guys, calling someone a cheater is obviously cheating. CHEATERS!

..................................................................................................................................................

Rules:

1. You must find something about the last user or users that have posted that you can call cheating.

2. You must point out the non- cheating way to do what you accused the user of doing wrong.

3. You must have fun calling someone a cheater.

you get the idea. try to be creative with this. I guess it's kinda similar to "Ban the User Above you" , but with the endless fun of calling someone a cheater. plus you can call multiple people cheaters at once. So cheat away, my fellow cheaters!

Inspired by the [thread=79629]Is it cheating?[/thread] thread. (go to around the middle of page two and you'll start to see the inspiration)

Edited May 23, 2014 by Endersmens
*splutters* Wha- What is this!? Making your own rules in a game? CHEATER!
What? Typing out that you are sputtering!? CHEATER!
I can tell you used a computer to post that, cheater. This post was delivered by carrier pigeon.
Carrier pigeons were outlawed in 1960. CHEATER!
You're on Duna? CHEATER!
You are a thing? CHEATER!
You type cheater in capitals, cheater !
Um...excuse me? a space before your exclamation point? you know putting spaces before exclamation points is cheating. Cheater!
This is a blatant disregard to the rules! You can only have 1 period after sentences! Cheats-mcgee!
You've just applied to the Kerbal Space Program, yet you have 273 posts (thus far)? CHEATER!

Exclamation point? Cheaterpants. Real players use dramatic...

...pauses for emphasis.
Cheater, only Calculon can use dramatic pauses!
Videos imbedded in posts? Cheater!

Giving human titles to vegetables? CHEETAAA!!!

Edited May 22, 2014 by 50ck37
respect to b and e roles in words
Having an Avatar pic look like an wall socket? CHEATER!!!!
You don't simply make people only have 1 period after sentences! Cheater.
Having a number symbol in a poast? Cheater!
Inventing your own spelling for "post"? Cheater. Real players use the Queen's English.
Being always the last to post when I go for it? CHEETAAAA!!!

oops... this was meant to Lord Potato...

Cheating my own cheat at the Potato Lord?? CHEEEETAAAAA!!|,
you cheat at trying to cheat someone who obviously is too busy cheating? YOU CHEATER!!
You obtained duct tape? Cheater!!!!!!
What? You put "awesome person" as your reputation title? All non-cheaters use the default. Cheater!
You're located in at least three places at once, if not more? ch33t0r!
